titleStmt.title: Cantus. Cantica sacra containing hymns and anthems for two voices to the organ, both Latine and English. Composed by Mr. Richard Dering. Dr. Christoph: Gibbons. Dr. Benjamin Rogers. Mr. Matth: Locke, and others. The second sett.
titleStmt.author: Playford, John, 1623-1686?
Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.
Dering, Richard, 1580 (ca.)-1630.
Gibbons, Christopher, 1615-1676.
Rogers, Benjamin, 1616-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Godbid, for John Playford,

notesStmt.note: In three parts; each with identical title page.
At end are contents of the last part.
The names of the contributors are bracketed together on title page.
Item identified on UMI microfilm as Wing P2455 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library; Harvard University Library.
